Education mandate: Hour a day of reading, writing, and maths could face backlash – principal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/education-mandate-hour-a-day-of-reading-writing-and-maths-could-face-backlash-principal/BSFDSX6DHRFINIYBXYJ2IPIPDY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/education-mandate-hour-a-day-of-reading-writing-and-maths-could-face-backlash-principal/BSFDSX6DHRFINIYBXYJ2IPIPDY/ Maia Hart, Local Democracy ReportingSchools will be required to teach an hour of reading, writing and maths every day. Sun, 26 Nov 2023 21:02:54 +0000 Riverlands School principal Bradley Roberts does not think he wants to see an hour each of reading, writing and maths mandated in a curriculum that already achieves that anyway.
